WRITING.TITLE: Hey! Me and a friend just made an awesome subreddit! Go check it out!

/r/memorablelifemoments - A place where you post about memorable moments in your life (obviously), whether they be happy, sad, funny, embarrassing, stupid, inspirational, cool, or anything else! Go check it out!
